trans-unit.source: This is an assignment for students to come up with a micro:bit program that uses Boolean variables, Boolean operators, and possibly the random function.
trans-unit.target: This is an assignment for students to come up with a micro:bit program that uses ブール型変数, ブール演算子, and possibly the random function.

trans-unit.source: Remind the students of all the different inputs available to them through the micro:bit.
trans-unit.target: Remind 生徒たち of all the ちがう入力 available to them through the micro:bit.

trans-unit.source: When you shake the micro:bit, it reports the current temperature in degrees Fahrenheit.
trans-unit.target: When you shake the micro:bit, it reports the current temperature in degrees Fahrenheit.

trans-unit.source: Button B measures the light level and if it is above 70 degrees AND very bright, it will display a sun icon.
trans-unit.target: Bボタン measures the light level and if it is above 70 degrees AND very bright, it will display a sun icon.

trans-unit.source: If it is above 70 degrees and less bright, it will display a cloudy symbol.
trans-unit.target: If it is above 70 degrees and less bright, it will display a cloudy symbol.

trans-unit.source: If it is dark, it will display a nighttime icon.
trans-unit.target: If it is dark, it will display a nighttime icon.

trans-unit.source: Button A displays an animation to tell you whether or not you should use sunscreen (on sunny or cloudy days but not at night or indoors.)
trans-unit.target: Aボタン displays an animation to tell you whether or not you should use sunscreen (on sunny or cloudy days but not at night or indoors.)

trans-unit.source: Make a holder that can hold the micro:bit and a bottle of sunscreen.
trans-unit.target: Make a holder that can hold the micro:bit and a bottle of sunscreen.

trans-unit.source: This example uses boolean operations because both light level AND temperature must be high in order to trigger the sun icon:
trans-unit.target: This example uses boolean operations because both light level AND temperature must be high in order to trigger the sun icon:

trans-unit.source: Create a game in which two players take turns on the same micro:bit. You can use a boolean variable called PlayerATurn to keep track of whose turn it is.
trans-unit.target: Create a game in which two players take turns on the same micro:bit. You can use a ブール型変数 called PlayerATurn to keep track of whose turn it is.

trans-unit.source: Board Game: Use boolean variables and random values as part of a board game (or improve your Board Game from the Variables lesson).
trans-unit.target: Board Game: Use ブール型変数 and random values as part of a board game (or improve your Board Game from the Variables lesson).

trans-unit.source: Make the board and pieces and a holder for the micro:bit.
trans-unit.target: Make the board and pieces and a holder for the micro:bit.

trans-unit.source: Try modding a current board game.
trans-unit.target: Try modding a current board game.

trans-unit.source: This is an example of a board game in which the micro:bit displays an arrow pointing in a random direction. The paper legend indicates different actions the player must take.
trans-unit.target: This is ひとつの例 of a board game in which the micro:bit displays an arrow pointing in a random direction. The paper legend indicates different actions the player must take.

trans-unit.source: Here is a portion of the board game's code.
trans-unit.target: Here is a portion of the board game's code.

trans-unit.source: A boolean variable is used to determine whose turn it is.
trans-unit.target: A ブール型変数 is used to determine whose turn it is.

trans-unit.source: If player1Turn is false, then it's player 2's turn.
trans-unit.target: If player1Turn is false, then it's player 2's turn.

trans-unit.source: A random number is generated to show the arrow seventy-five percent of the time (for values of 0, 1, or 2).
trans-unit.target: A random number is generated to show the arrow seventy-five percent of the time (for values of 0, 1, or 2).

trans-unit.source: Have students write a reflection of about 150–300 words, addressing the following points:
trans-unit.target: >生徒たちに以下の内容を含む１５０～３００字程度のレビューを書いてもらいましょう。:

trans-unit.source: How did you incorporate boolean variables into your micro:bit program?
trans-unit.target: How did you incorporate ブール型変数 into your micro:bit program?

trans-unit.source: How did you incorporate boolean operators into your micro:bit program?
trans-unit.target: How did you incorporate ブール演算子 into your micro:bit program?

trans-unit.source: Describe something in your project that you are proud of.
trans-unit.target: Describe something in your project that you are proud of.

trans-unit.source: If you had more time to work on this project, describe what you might add or change.
trans-unit.target: If you had more time to work on this project, describe what you might add or change.

trans-unit.source:
4 = More than 2 Boolean variables are implemented in a meaningful way.
3 = At least 2 Boolean variables are implemented in a meaningful way.
2 = At least 1 Boolean variable is implemented in a meaningful way.
1 = No Boolean variables are implemented.
trans-unit.target:
4 = More than 2 ブール型変数 are implemented in a meaningful way.
3 = At least 2 ブール型変数 are implemented in a meaningful way.
2 = At least 1 ブール型変数 is implemented in a meaningful way.
1 = No ブール型変数 are implemented.

trans-unit.source:
4 = micro:bit program:
* Uses Booleans in a way that is integral to the program.
* Compiles and runs as intended
* Meaningful comments in code
3 = micro:bit program lacks 1 of the required element.
2 = micro:bit program lacks 2 of the required elements.
1 = micro:bit program lacks all of the required elements.
trans-unit.target:
4 = micro:bit program:
* Uses Booleans in a way that is integral to the program.
* 目的通りにコンパイル、実行している
* コードの中に意味のあるコメントがある
3 = micro:bit プラグラムから１つの必要な要素が欠けている。
2 = micro:bit プラグラムから２つの必要な要素が欠けている。
1 = micro:bit プラグラムからすべての必要な要素が欠けている。

trans-unit.source:
4 = Reflection piece addresses all prompts.
3 = Reflection piece lacks 1 of the required elements.
2 = Reflection piece lacks 2 of the required elements.
1 = Reflection piece lacks 3 of the required elements.
trans-unit.target:
4 = Reflection piece addresses all prompts.
3 = １つの項目が満たされていない。
2 = ２つの項目が満たされていない。
1 = ３つの項目が満たされていない。
